Articles.Content:
Hello

This craft's inspiration was the jedi starfighter and it's ability to dock to a stardrive section for long distance traveling, so this craft is actually two separate crafts. The Trident SSTO, and the Trident Stardrive. Both can get into a stable orbit relatively easilly, where we you may dock the SSTO into the stardrive, and head for the stars (or at least a few moons and planets ). There isn't much more I can say about it. The SSTO tends to wobble around a bit when connected to the Stardrive section since they are only connected through a tiny clamp o tron jr port, so just be careful when turning. (I haven't broke it yet during any of my maneuvers, but it's always good to be careful).

Anyways, here's the SSTO craft:

DOWNLOAD

and here's the Stardrive:

DOWNLOAD

And here's a little teaser, enjoy

P.S.

Don't forget to try the Stardrive docking from inside the cockpit. It's easy and feels awesome

Edited April 22, 2015 by Angezerus
Very nice, I like the 'stardrive' concept very much. +1, may build a version myself!
Cool idea, not that i havent build interplanetary transfer rings before though. Mine were smaller though and used ions.
